xml.p: Introduction: "Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm Caroline.#$e#My husband runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, Abigail? She's the pale one with the purple hair." #!String
Resort_Entering: "Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky. I'm still chewing on it." #!String
Resort_Leaving: "I'll sleep well tonight!$h" #!String
Resort_Shore: "The water is so warm here compared to the valley. It's really pleasant!" #!String
Resort_Chair: "%Caroline is trying to nap." #!String
Resort_Bar: "I told Gus to surprise me, and he made an iced green tea with mango zest. How nice!$h" #!String
Resort: "Hi @. Are you here to relax, or to do work?" #!String
Mon: "I wish Abby wouldn't spend so much time in her room." #!String
Mon_inlaw_Abigail: "Hi, @. Are you enjoying the married life? I hope so!" #!String

Mon8: "#$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?" #!String
Tue: "I've seen wild horesradish in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food." #!String
Wed: "Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, we might be able to help you out.#$e#We carry a variety of useful items." #!String
Thu: "#$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Pierre to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon." #!String
Fri: "It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get." #!String
Sat: "Is it just me, or does Abigail have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand." #!String
Sat_inlaw_Abigail: "Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abigail moved out...#$e#No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!$h" #!String
Sat2: "Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from..." #!String
Sat4: "Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from..." #!String

Sat6: "#$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#Pierre's a bit traditional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first." #!String
Sun: "Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?" #!String
Wed6: "Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.#$e#I'm glad that we've become friends." #!String
summer_Mon: "On wednesdays the shop is closed.#$e#Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything." #!String

summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: "How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks." #!String

summer_Wed6: "Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...$s " #!String
fall_Mon: "Fall is Abby's favorite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often." #!String

fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: "Abby was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was before I met Pierre. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm." #!String
fall_Tue: "I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food." #!String
fall_Sat: "Is it just me, or does Abigail play too many video games?#$e#Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned." #!String
fall_Wed6: "You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl." #!String
winter_Tue: "Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food." #!String
winter_Fri: "Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.#$e#I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns." #!String
winter_Sat: "Don't you think Abby would look better with her natural hair color?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-colored hair." #!String
winter_Wed6: "Are you excited for the new year?#$e#I predict that you'll be super-successful on your farm.$h" #!String
